title: FS--TOUGH lot--3 SGC SLers and a HINDU SOLD

posts.post_title: FS--TOUGH lot--3 SGC SLers and a HINDU SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is a great group of scarce T206's.  What you get is 3 SGC 40 T206 Piedmont 350 Southern Leaguers (Paige, Otey 'Lionel Carter Collection', & Rockenfeld) plus a clean brown Hindu revers Lumley graded SGC AUT from apparent minimal trimming.  Price for the lot is $450 insured and delivered.

Contact me at [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url] for scans and inquiries.

Thanks SOLD
